title: The element of surprise!
text:
This is a very popular combo move that gets your attacker to the target quickly and ends with a boosted Basic Melee Attack. The element of surprise!

- y The target: must be an enemy model, must be in lineof-sight (see Line-of-Sight pg.52), and must be within reach of the selected melee weapon when the Advance movement ends. Your model cannot Charge a target that they are engaging or being engaged by.

- y Sidestep: Move 1 hex in any direction as the very first hex of the Charge (counts as -1 MOV).

- y MOV Bonus : Advance up to normal MOV +2 hexes in a straight or slalom line.

- y Melee Attack: Make a Basic Melee Attack against the Charge target at the end of the Charge .  Add +2 dice to your dice pool for the Charge attack.
